teaser: Looking for a responsible, punctual PCA to help a 48 year old quad with cooking, laundry, light cleaning/organizing, bathing, ROM, massages. Must be willing to work through my agency and pass background check, and have reliable transportation and insurance. I have 25 hrs/week PCA hours and pay is $11/hr. Must be mellow and comfortable doing all cares. Must be able to start immediately after an in-person interview.
